page.title: 07LONGSTANTON SHOPS
page.content: Our block contains 5 retail shops, the only ones in the village. They are{a {general store/post office; a {newsagent/confectioner; a television {dealer; an office_equipment firm and {a flooring specialist.}The last two are recent arrivals. The general store and the newsagent compete to some extent: e.g. over newsrounds. Both proprietors state they are content with the custom they receive, despite the presence of Tesco's supermarket at neighbouring Bar Hill. Both shops employ members of the proprietor's families; the general store has other help as well, and between them they employ eleven 'newsboys'. The TV business opened here in 1952. The proprietor succeeded his father,and hopes his son will soon join him. He sells, rents and repairs mainly TVs, videos and domestic appliances.
